name: 嚴佳茹
objective: This course is composed of independent study and group exercises with proctored weekly lectures that will cover the technical requirements of the Taiwan Green Building Green Building Rating System, EEWH. Additionally, this course will focus on providing an overview of the knowledge required for taking the EEWH Accreditation. The course will provide students with an understanding of how EEWH is being used throughout the design and construction industries to define various levels of sustainable project design and a credit-by-credit review of the Rating System.
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction
W2: Agenda of global climate change and sustainability
W3: Trends between International and domestics of Sustainable Architecture Design (EEWH system)
W4~W7: Ecology category (Indicators of Biodiversity, Greenery and Water content of the site)
W8~9: Mid-term Assignment and Oral presentation 
W10~W12: Energy Saving(Indicators of Daily Energy Conservation(prerequisite))
W13~W14: Waste Reduction category (Indicators of CO2Emission Reduction, Construction Waste 
W15~W16: Health category (Indicators of Indoor Environment, Water Conservation (prerequisite), Sewage and waste disposal facility improvement)
W17&W18: Final Assignment and Oral presentation
scorePolicy:

Midterm Assignment and Oral presentation 30%
Final term Assignment and Oral presentation 30%
